top_categories.workout_context: 80ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Wörthersee Gravel Race's Austrian Alps, European gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 75 miles.
At Wörthersee Gravel Race, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Wörthersee Gravel Race's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Wörthersee Gravel Race. Train it until it feels boring.
75 miles on austrian Alps gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
6,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
6,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Wörthersee Gravel Race, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Base fitness for Wörthersee Gravel Race. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on austrian Alps gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Wörthersee Gravel Race’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Wörthersee Gravel Race. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Wörthersee Gravel Race requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on austrian alps gravel to build confidence. Expect: austrian alps, european gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 75 miles of austrian alps gravel in Wörthersee, Austria.
